reviews.review: Simply the best. It is worthy of the BioShock saga.

Great atmosphere and visuals but boring narrative, mechanics and gameplay. Also it's very repetitive and grindy.

4/10

Uma das melhores ou a melhor historia de todos os jogos que j√° joguei.!!!!

this game brings a new type of world different from the other 2 games (at least on the first part of gameplay), i actually bought the bioshock games and started from the first thinking Elizabeth was in all 3 games, but it wasnt the case, still... Combat is ok, aiming sensitivity for me is a bit bonky, i do miss having an arsenal with me. Story is shocking, the final twists really melt my brain, or half of it. Burial at sea is also entertaining and completes the full story. Im still a bit confused, because .... [spoiler] Elizabeth was the responsible for giving Atlas the magic phrase to command the player on bioshock 1... dimensional travel is a complicated subject. If it wasnt for Elizabeth, Atlas could have never known the phrase and activate Jack on bioshock 1, so he would have failed/died by Ryan? bioshock infinite happens before bioshock 1, but the tears make Elizabeth time travel.... my brain hurts just thinking about it, anywho good game.[/spoiler]
This game, I love and I hate it. Took me for a heck of a ride.
√âPICO. No envejeci√≥ de la mejor manera pero he de decir que es tremendo juego. Si te gustaron los anteriores este te va a encantar.

Finished the game for the 4th time yesterday. This time with the DLCs. And for a sec I went speechless . Felt like its a game of DARK(THE SERIES). Never a fan of physics but DAMN, I hardly believe I'll play a game this good with all the DLCs in a while.

9/10 

Would have been a 10/10 if I actually got to finish throwing the baseball at that racist bastard.
Nothing will ever be better than the first Bioshock. But Infinite is definitely better than Bioshock 2 and I am very much enjoying it
Abe Lincoln and George Washington simulator. 10/10 would buy again.

Un juego extremadamente bueno, con una historia increible, jugabilidad pulida al maximo, personajes con los que nos encari√±amos a diferencia de los bioshock anteriores donde el atractivo era la historia unicamente. este juego cuenta con con accion sin parar con espacios de calma que no estan de mas.  100% recomendado
My life was good until this game destroyed half my soul

The best game tha I've played.

Gameplay: Very Good
The gameplay is perfect on a shooter game perspective. You have to plan before fighting your enemies and manage your resources fairly well. The Vigors and their combinations made the game much more dynamic. Also the Tears mechanic made things even better.
In an era of only CoD games, with bad stories and a simple gameplay, I think that Bioshock Infinite is a gem.

Story: The best part of the game
The story is the best that I've seen in a game. I recommend to search for everything and play on a completitionist way. Gather everything and listen to everything.

Graphics: Very good
Graphics aged very well. The Bioshock 1,2 and Infinite art style are the best on the shooter games market in my opinion.

Simply go ahead and buy it :) (also, it always have a steam discount)

Play the DLCs too.

[h1]"Voc√™ n√£o precisa proteger Elizabeth em combate. Ela pode cuidar de si mesma."[/h1]

Sei que a este ponto, escrever uma avalia√ß√£o tardia sobre Bioshock Infinite seria cair em repeti√ß√£o. Mas por favor! JOGUE ESTE JOGO. Aos pre√ßos promocionais do pacote da cole√ß√£o que ao jogo se aplicam, ainda √© muito pouco pela obra-prima que √© este jogo.

√â incr√≠vel.
√â um jogo... N√£o, √© uma hist√≥ria... N√£o, √© a experi√™ncia m√°xima de narrativa... N√£o, √© muito mais que isso, t√£o somente.

Minhas impress√µes sobre o estilo de jogo a priori, fizeram-me acreditar que o design de FPS de Bioshock √© um pouco diferente dos outros jogos de tiro, justamente pelos vigores - estes sendo habilidades sobrenaturais que se √© poss√≠vel utilizar com o personagem em combate -, e apesar de diferente, no entanto, acredito que isso criou ainda mais identidade. O gameplay enquanto FPS √© diferente, e muito melhor que os outros jogos do g√™nero que joguei.

Com rela√ß√£o a gr√°ficos √© obviamente um jogo muito belo, e se sustenta com muita firmeza levando-se em conta a data de lan√ßamento. √â um jogo de 2013. E √© perfeito. Columbia √© uma cidade viva, epopeica, e assim como Rapture sua apresenta√ß√£o ao jogador √© feita de forma √©pica.

A narrativa, sem spoileres, √© um encerramento perempt√≥rio √† hist√≥ria constru√≠da nos outros dois excelent√≠ssimos jogos. √â muito recomend√°vel (necess√°rio, ainda) jogar as duas DLCs, [i]Burial at the Sea[/i], partes um e dois, ap√≥s o encerramento do jogo principal para compreender a real sequ√™ncia e grandeza da corrente de acontecimentos de Bioshock. √â uma obra narrativa cheia de ganchos, reviravoltas e personagens cativantes.

[hr][/hr]

No decorrer do jogo existe uma pequena sutileza de escolhas que permite ao jogador cursar a hist√≥ria de forma implac√°vel ou, ainda, de forma um tanto mais sutil; √©tica. N√£o √© o tempo todo, e isto n√£o influencia em nada. Achei pertinente citar, e √© incr√≠vel.

Reitero: Jogue! Melhor ainda, jogue, ainda, os outros jogos da franquia Bioshock, se puder. Ele √© [u]inteiramente[/u] conectado ao curso construtivo que a s√©rie figurou, e √© uma resposta definitiva para tudo.

Aleluia.

El mejor Bioshock con diferencia, tanto en la jugabilidad que es la m√°s r√°pida y adictiva (incluyendo el gancho que es un a√±adido que me encanta), la banda sonora es espectacular, gr√°ficamente se defiende realmente bien teniendo en cuenta los a√±os que tiene, los escenarios son espectaculares, los nuevos poderes (aunque son menos que en los anteriores) me parecen buen√≠simos y super diferentes, Elizabeth como compa√±era se podr√≠a mejorar bastante pero es √∫til, aparte de que se hace mas divertido tener a alguien acompa√±√°ndote en el juego. La historia es una locura, la mejor con diferencia y con un final realmente bueno. Es el mejor de todos los Bioshock llevando todo lo que ya tenia bueno a otro nivel, y los DLCs son realmente buenos, con una muy buena historia y con una forma completamente diferente de jugar en el 2¬∫ DLC. Compra recomendadisima, 10/10

Sinceramente es un juego excelente en todos los aspectos, lo termine hace poco y me quede muy sorprendido con el final , si bien los graficos capaz no son la gran cosa para mi son preciosos junto con los paisajes. Ademas de la historia que tiene, literal no podes parar de jugarlo por que necesitas saber que va a pasar y cuando encontras a elizabeth es mucho mejor ya que empezas a ver otros escenarios, exploras mas poderes, por otro lado tu acompa√±ante (en este caso la misma chica) no se siente pesado para nada ya que te brinda ayuda en los combates casi todo el rato o dinero, cosa que te ayuda como jugador pero no excesivamente por que con todo y eso podes morir. Conclusion: Es un juegazo  que recomiendo comprar y mas si esta en oferta, a pesar de ser la primera vez me anime a jugarlo en dificil y no arruina la experiencia para nada , si no la mejora :)

Si jugaste los dos anteriores, es obligatorio y de hecho, se disfruta m√°s si se conoce la historia, sobre todo por los dlc. El juego es simplemente brillante, se han escrito mil cosas sobre el, no descubro nada nuevo pero lo recomiendo, sin duda, un juego de esos que marcan.
buen juego pero no se siente como jugar a bioshock

Juegazo,sin palabras la verdad, la historia es un poco confusa pero mientras mas avanzas mas la entenderas, la tematica de una ciudad en el cielo es muy buena aparte de Rapture, y sin contar los DLC de panteon marino. En general es un juegazo, yo lo consegui en oferta, pero si les soy sinceros vale la pena hasta sin oferta

best game i have ever played

for me it was kind of stale and boring, had to force myself to finish it, 
Id say Bioshock 2 is better
This game is actually just a looting simulator

If you compare this game to the first 2, it falls awfully short, the first two games of the saga were such amazing games, the atmosphere they achieved and that feeling of wanting to know more and explore the world they built is nowhere to be found in this game.

Despite that, i think the game was good, the gameplay and graphics were good, the soundtracks and voice acting were excellent. Id recommend to pick it up in a sale if possible. 

As for what i didnt like about the game: the storyline is just a mess, and there's many things that you only learn through hidden audios/voxafones, so if you missed one, you might not understand something important lore-wise. Also the ending is waaaay to sudden for the complexity it has and imo its kinda sad that they dont let you choose endings like in the previous games since, to me this ending was meh/bad ( also to have a KEY hidden scene in postcredits is such an awfull thing to do).
Also i didnt like that they limited your gun selection(can only carry 2 guns), while also making upgrades for guns and especially vigors so expensive, all that kinda forced me to play with just a few guns(4) and maybe 3 vigors in total. And its not a game that id replay to be honest, so having that many weapons/vigors/game content left unused is just sad.
Jogo fant√°stico e com √≥timos personagens! Recomendo demais.
Gets stale amd boring after a few hours and then you have to play like 20 more

Sociologically brilliant and curiously poignant these days.

Are you a self-loathing, virtue signaling, box ticking obsessed, sjw simp like me (?) ;-)  If so, then this could have been the perfect game for you.  Sadly the game has too many annoying technical flaws to waste your time on. 

Ultimately it's the cumbersome control system that makes me not want to play the damn thing. That and the fact that the game randomly jumps to desktop.

Das Spiel F√ºhlt sich nicht an wie ein BioShock aber,  es ist einer der Besten Shooter der Letzen Jahrzehnt Meiner Meinung Nach.
Das Spiel hat seine Macken und Probleme, die aber sich sehr in grenzen halten!
Die Story ist gut geschrieben aber am ende Verwirrend und die Charaktere sind oftmals mit einer Liebe zu Detail gebunden Gef√ºllt.
Die Grafik geht mehr als okay und Sieht Manchmal Fantastisch aus. Wenn man mehr Rausholen will Empfehle Ich 
Re-Shade zu installiere.
Sowie das FOV in der Config zu Erh√∂hen.
Steuerung ist mehr als in Ordnung, Die Einstellung sind im Gegensatz zu Heutzutage Veraltet!
Das sind aber Typische Probleme Von Alten Spiele 
Die Welt und die √Ñsthetik gefallen mir sehr mit dem Bunten Farben und der Industriellen St√§dtische Umgebung aber sie ist  nicht Sehr lau. 
Auch in der Stadt Findet man Sehr Viel Gr√ºn und Man hat das Problem nicht das die Welt Repetitiv wirkt.
Das Gunplay f√ºhlt sich sehr Modern und Sauber an au√üer in den Iron-Sights da F√ºhlt sich der R√ºcksto√ü Extrem Stark an.
Die F√§higkeit die man hat lassen ein Gr√∂√üe Kreative M√∂glichkeiten bei Gegnern und Bossen. 

Ich kann nur empfehlen das Spiel auf Schwer zu Spielen sonst wird es Schnell Unterfordert und Langweilig.

Fazit: Wer ein Gutes Action Spiel haben M√∂chte Mit ca,12 Stunden Spielzeit und einer Immersiven und Bunten Atmosph√§re  ist Gut bedient.

"We swim in different oceans, but land on the same shore"

The different choices you make during the game don't matter, and that's the point. 

Brilliant story telling, absolutely brilliant. Enjoyable gameplay, and beautiful visuals. Plus, Elizabeth is probably one of the best designed followers in gaming history. And do make sure to watch through the credits.

Edit for the Burial At Sea DLC:

Buy it. Play it. If you've completed the base game and loved it, it's criminal to not play BaS. I'd say it ties Infinite up and connects it, in the Bioshock universe. Was I happy with the direction the story went and concluded? No. But that doesn't mean it's bad, I felt it ended Infinite in a good way. 

Not only did the writing stay on par with the base game, BaS introduced a fresh take to play through the game. Just get it, you won't regret it...except for maybe feeling a little sad
